name: MyDiscounts
0:
”Alexa, ask my discounts”
”Alexa, ask my discounts to open the menu”
”Alexa, ask my discounts to meet”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my discounts
Developer Terms of Use
des: With this skill you will be able to follow the highlights, find out more information and contact My Discounts. In addition, you can add this week's deal to your amazon cart and complete your purchase whenever you want. This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
